privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.text: Our open data collection archive does not contain individual tweets, but anonymised counts of Twitter activity at the 'RW' level. The live map at PetaJakarta.org does store any information about users; all information derived from location-enabled mobile devices is stored and displayed anonymously.

about.title: About us
about.intro:
petajakarta.org is supported by a grassroots coalition to harness the power of social media by gathering, sorting, and displaying information about flooding for Jakarta residents in real time.

The platform runs on the open source software known as CogniCity. This GeoSocial Intelligence framework allows data to be collected and disseminated by community members through their location-enabled mobile devices to map information about flooding and water infrastructure in real-time.

To read more about the project background, structure, and objectives, please visit info.petajakarta.org.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: We do not store any information about users; all information derived from location-enabled mobile devices is stored and displayed anonymously.

parameters.Name: format
parameters.Description: Defines the format of the requested reports data as either geojson (default) or topojson. If unspecified will default to geojson.

parameters.Name: level
parameters.Description: Specifies area for the counts (e.g. country, state, city etc.). If unspecified defaults to Jakarta "subdistrict" level.

parameters.Name: hours
parameters.Description: Specifies the duration of the count, hours={1|3|6}. If unspecified defaults to past 1 hour.

parameters.Name: end_time
parameters.Description: The date and time of the end of the aggregate period represented as Unix time. Time should be one of {06:00|12:00|18:00|00:00} Indonesian time.
